Apache virtual host statistics
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2010-02-19-apache-virtual-host-statistics/ 2010-02-19T00:00:00+0000 2010-02-19T00:00:00+0000 As part of a project I’m working on I wanted to get a rough idea of the activity of the Apache virtual hosts on the system. I wasn’t able to find exactly what I wanted, so I refreshed my memory of curses to bring you vhoststats. This tools reads an Apache log file (with support for arbitrary formats) and generates a dynamic bar chart showing the activity (in number of requests and bytes transferred) of hosts on the system.
